verses.roman:
āra dina prabhu kahe saba bhakta-gaṇe
nija-nija-gṛhe sabe karaha gamane

synonyms: āra dina—the next day; prabhu—the Lord; kahe—says; saba—all; bhakta-gaṇe—to the devotees; nija-nija-gṛhe—to your respective homes; sabe—all; karaha—do; gamane—returning.
translation: The next day, Lord Caitanya Mahāprabhu requested all the devotees to return to their respective homes.
